item.title: Meet Spotify’s New “Big on BookTok” Audiobook Hub
item.description: Spotify has collaborated with TikTok to create the Big on BookTok hub, which spotlights the trending titles and authors on BookTok right now.

item.title: The 2025 National Book Award Longlist in Young People’s Literature
item.description: Here are the 10 books on the 2025 National Book Awards Longlist for Young People's Literature.

item.title: Gothic Horror! Nightmare Witches!
item.description: When you prefer your fiction dark and your witches willing to burn it all down, find the nightmare fuel you need in this gothic horror.

item.title: The Best New Book Releases Out September 9, 2025
item.description: It's already autumn in Book World! Get ready for eldritch paintings, demon-possessed houses, and murder in a post-war Tokyo.

item.title: Why Would a County Evict Its Public Library Over $1?: Behind The Push to Decimate A Josephine County (OR) Library
item.description: How a small group of far-right ideologues have tried to decimate Josephine County Library over the course of the last several years–and $1.
